Lucy: What do you think that

Ian: It sounded like it came

ok. Don't bother. I'm sure it was just -- it was nothing.

Lucy: Yeah.

Ian: You seem a little on edge.

Lucy: Hi!

see you.

Lucy: Just come on in. Hey, 
you. Hi.

pie.

Rafe: Hi.
